attributes.action: GET TOUGH ON CRIME 8 YEARS MINIMUM IF CONVICTED OF CARRYING ANY DANGEROUS WEAPON
attributes.additional_details:
THE HARD WORKING CITIZENS OF THE UK HAVE HAD ENOUGH OF THE CONTINUAL SOFT OPTION ON CRIME IN THIS COUNTRY, THE ELDERLEY ARE AFRAID TO WALK OUR STREETS BRITAIN HAS BECOME A BROKEN SOCIETY ENOUGH TOUGH TALK WITH NO ACTION BY CONSECUTIVE GOVERNMENTS.
ANYONE CONVICTED OF CARRYING A DANGEROUS WEAPON INCLUDING KNIVES WILL BE SENTENCED TO A MINIUM 8 YEARS IN PRISON.
